trans-unit.source: Provides a way to specify a custom LINQ query that is defined in a method.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en metode til å angi en egendefinert LINQ-spørring som er definert i en metode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control supports custom LINQ queries.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontrollen støtter egendefinerte LINQ-spørringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: You can define a custom LINQ query in a method and use the MethodExpression filter option to invoke the query in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere en egendefinert LINQ-spørring i en metode og bruke alternativet MethodExpression filter til å aktivere spørringen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: The method that contains the custom LINQ query must meet the following criteria: - The method must be static (`Shared` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Metoden som inneholder den egendefinerte LINQ-spørringen må oppfylle følgende vilkår:-metoden må være statisk (`Shared` i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The first parameter must be an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object.
trans-unit.target: Den første parameteren må være en <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>eller <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>

trans-unit.source: The method can have more than one parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan ha flere enn én parameter.

trans-unit.source: - The return value cannot change the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> type that is queried.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke endre verdien som returneres av <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>eller <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>type som er spurt.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>

trans-unit.source: The MethodExpression searches for the method that contains the query in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: MethodExpression søker etter metoden som inneholder spørring i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression.TypeName%2A> property is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control, the MethodExpression object looks for the method in the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression.TypeName%2A>egenskapen er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontroll, MethodExpression objektet ser ut for metoden i den angitte typen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource>, the method looks for the method on the context type (<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> object.) 3.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden implementerer <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource>, metoden ser etter metoden for context-typen (<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> eller <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>objektet.)</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource> 3.

trans-unit.source: The method looks for the method in a template control, in the base class for the page, or in a user control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ser etter metoden i en mal-kontroll i basisklassen for siden eller i en brukerkontroll.

trans-unit.source: The MethodExpression class is like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression> class except that the method expression is executed in response to a method call, and the custom expression is executed in response to an event.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MethodExpression er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression>klasse bortsett fra at uttrykket metoden utføres som svar på et metodekall, og det egendefinerte uttrykket utføres som svar på en hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the expression by using the specified <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Løser uttrykket ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde kontrollen skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that was used to resolve the expression.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet som ble brukt til å løse uttrykket.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The data source control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakildekontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The method was not found.
trans-unit.target: Finner ikke metoden.

trans-unit.source: -or- The method is not static.
trans-unit.target: - eller - metoden er ikke statisk.

trans-unit.source: -or- The type of the passed <xref uid="langword_csharp_IQuerable<T>" name="IQuerable<T>" href=""></xref> object was changed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - typen for den angitte <xref uid="langword_csharp_IQuerable<T>" name="IQuerable<T>" href=""> </xref> objektet ble endret.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om uttrykket som skal ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression> object searches for a method that contains the query by looking in specific locations and searching in a specific order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>objekt Søk etter en metode som inneholder spørringen ved å slå på bestemte steder og søke i en bestemt rekkefølge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `false` to throw an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression> object does not find a method that contains a LINQ.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til `false` til Iverksett et unntak hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression>ikke finnes en metode som inneholder et LINQ.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression is ignored; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis uttrykket ignoreres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method that contains a custom LINQ query.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden som inneholder en egendefinert LINQ-spørringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression> object enables you to call a custom LINQ query that is defined in a method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>objektet gjør det mulig å kalle en egendefinert LINQ-spørring som er definert i en metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>

trans-unit.source: You specify the method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control in the page.
trans-unit.target: Du angir metode i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontroll på denne siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method that contains the custom LINQ query.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden som inneholder den egendefinerte LINQ-spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class whose method contains the custom query.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir klassen der metoden inneholder den egendefinerte spørringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression> class enables you to specify a custom expression for a data source in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>klassen kan du angi et egendefinert uttrykk for en datakilde i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.MethodExpression>

trans-unit.source: You can use the TypeName property to specify the class to which the method belongs.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen TypeName til å angi klassen metoden tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The class that the method is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Klassen som metoden er medlem av.
